spell_tooltip.description: Whirling Dragon Punch knocks enemies up into the air and causes them to fall slowly until they reach the ground.
Fists of Fury now reduces all targets movement speed by 90%, and you Parry all attacks while channelling Fists of Fury.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 413,817 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 419,022 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Roll and Chi Torpedo travel a small distance further.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 38,724 Nature damage or 84,464 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 0.6% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Ring of Peace by 5 sec and Song of Chi-Ji's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 57,663 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 822,815 Physical damage to your primary target and 444,320 damage to all other enemies over 3.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 516,191 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 10% and critical damage increased by 18%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 296,712 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.

During Storm, Earth, and Fire, Chi costs are reduced by 1 and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec. 

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 1.3 million Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec with Tiger Lightning for 29,793 Nature damage.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Strike of the Windlord summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 506,134 Physical damage over 10.5 sec to all enemies within 9 yards. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 174,536 Nature damage.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Targets hit by Strike of the Windlord have a 100% chance to be struck for 10% additional Nature damage from your spells and abilities for 10 sec.
Chi spenders increase the damage of your next Crackling Jade Lightning by 400% and reduce its cost by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 527,108 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 325,556 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Strike of the Windlord's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its damage is increased by 100%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.

The August Celestials empower you, causing you to radiate 5.9 million Nature damage onto enemies and 608,961 healing onto up to 5 injured allies within 15 yds over 3.2 sec, split evenly among them. Healing and damage increased by 6% per enemy struck, up to 30%.

You may move while channeling, but casting other healing or damaging spells cancels this effect.
Fists of Fury and Spinning Crane Kick deal 10% more damage.

Tiger Palm has a chance to cause Xuen to claw your target for 365,876 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 25% of the damage done.

Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Rushing Jade Wind while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.

Strike of the Windlord calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Fists of Fury, Strike of the Windlord, Rising Sun Kick, Flying Serpent Kick, and Whirling Dragon Punch by 75% for 6 sec. 

The channel time of Fists of Fury is reduced by 50% while Yu'lon is active.

After Xuen assists you, your next Blackout Kick refunds 2 stacks of Teachings of the Monastery and causes Niuzao to stomp at your target's location, dealing 216,815 damage to nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Rushing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to increase your energy regeneration by 20% for 6 sec and quickly rush to 5 enemies, dealing 216,815 Physical damage to each target struck.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Kick upwards, dealing 426,294 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 420,411 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Vivify healing is increased by 20%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 30,542 Nature damage to the enemy and 28,791 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 2% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 108,673 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.
When you Blackout Kick, your Stagger is reduced by 93,076.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 367,328.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.
Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6.4 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Kick upwards, dealing 418,861 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 419,719 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Grants an additional charge of Roll and Chi Torpedo.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Vivify healing is increased by 40%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 39,506 Nature damage or 85,061 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 4% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 446,486 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 265,321 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.
Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.7 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 335,034 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.5 million damage.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.5 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 133,206, reduced beyond 5 allies.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.
Your Enveloping Mists heal the target for 2.0% of their maximum health each time they take direct damage.

Summons an effigy of Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent for 25 sec. Yu'lon will heal injured allies with Soothing Breath, healing the target and up to 2 allies for 114,002 over 3.6 sec. 

Enveloping Mist costs 50% less mana while Yu'lon is active.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
While channeling Mana Tea you exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 5 allies within 15 yards for 49,006 every 0.4 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 146,825 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 2.3 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist has a 10% chance to immediately spread to an additional target when initially cast or when traveling to a new target.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
Thunder Focus Tea now empowers your next 2 spells.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 15% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
